item.title: 货币价格为何在过去 6 年中飙升？
item.description:
发现真正的中性汇率

Discovering the true neutral rate

】

item.title: 奇货可居：货币价格为何在 6 年内飙升 (播客)
item.description: 2019 年到 2025 年之间发生了什么变化？为什么利率如此之高？为什么美联储在短期内重回 ZIRP 看上去几乎不可理喻？为什么投资者预期本轮降息周期如此肤浅？从理论上讲，答案是中性利率上升了。但什么是中性利率？在本期节目中，我们采访了彭博经济公司的杰米-拉什（Jamie Rush）和彭博经济公司的首席经济学家汤姆-奥利克（Tom Orlik）。他们与【原文：What changed between 2019 and 2025? Why are interest rates so much higher? Why does it seem virtually unfathomable that the Fed will return to ZIRP anytime soon? Why do investors expect this rate cut cycle to be so shallow? The answer, theoretically, is that the neutral rate of interest has gone up. But what is the neutral rate of interest, and why has it moved? On this episode, we speak with Jamie Rush of Bloomberg Economics and Tom Orlik, the Chief Economist at Bloomberg Economics. They, along】

item.title: 日元急剧贬值令日本央行放缓加息步伐的希望破灭
item.description: 日本可能的下任首相佐佐江隆一有可能无意中促使日本央行最早于本月加息。【原文：Japan’s likely next prime minister, Sanae Takaichi, risks unintentionally prompting a Bank of Japan rate hike as early as this month.】

item.title: Blackstone 的 Clarion 寻求 11 亿英镑的私人信用贷款
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 旗下的 Clarion Events 正在洽谈从私人信贷机构借贷约 11 亿英镑（15 亿美元），将用于支付股息和为现有债务再融资。【原文：Blackstone Inc.’s Clarion Events is in talks to borrow about £1.1 billion ($1.5 billion) from private credit lenders that will be used to fund a dividend and refinance existing debt, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 据说 GIP 的 Skyborn 正在寻求出售德国海上风电公司的股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，贝莱德公司（Blackrock Inc.【原文：Skyborn Renewables, a unit of Blackrock Inc.’s Global Infrastructure Partners, is looking to sell a stake in a major wind farm under development off Germany, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 假肢制造商奥托博克法兰克福首秀股价上涨 11
item.description: Ottobock SE & Co.公司的股票周四在法兰克福首次交易时段上涨，此前该公司在德国进行了一年多以来最大规模的首次公开募股。【原文：Ottobock SE & Co. shares rose in the prosthetics firm’s debut trading session in Frankfurt on Thursday, after the biggest initial public offering in Germany in more than a year.】

item.title: 软银旗下 PayPay 投资日本 Binance，进军加密货币领域
item.description: 软银集团（SoftBank Group Corp.【原文：SoftBank Group Corp.’s digital payment provider PayPay Corp. has taken a 40% stake in Binance’s Japan unit, seeking to capitalize on the country’s booming crypto market.】

item.title: 黄金创纪录反弹有助于中国挑战特朗普和美元
item.description:
北京正在抓住机会，为美国的金融主导地位提供一个替代方案。【原文：

Beijing is seizing the opportunity to offer up an alternative to US financial dominance.

】

item.title: 中国竞争对手激增，全球最大手套制造商着眼于美国增长
item.description: 全球最大的手套制造商 Top Glove Corp.Bhd. 预计将在 2026 财年扩大在美国的销售，尽管它面临着来自中国竞争对手的日益激烈的竞争，这些竞争对手利用美国较低的关税在东南亚建立生产基地。【原文：The world’s largest glove maker Top Glove Corp. Bhd. expects to expand US sales in fiscal year 2026 even as it faces intensifying competition from Chinese rivals setting up production in Southeast Asia to take advantage of lower American tariffs.】

item.title: 皮提表示，泰国将在 2026 年前保持宽松利率政策
item.description: 泰国央行一位副行长表示，鉴于泰国经济疲软以及全球经济进一步震荡的风险，泰国央行可能会在明年继续保持宽松的货币政策。【原文：The Bank of Thailand will likely keep monetary policy loose through next year, according to a deputy governor, given the country’s weak economy and the risk of further global shocks.】

item.title: 优衣库所有者预计新财年利润和销售额均将增长
item.description: 优衣库的所有者 Fast Retailing Co. 预测截至 2026 年 8 月的财年利润和销售额将有所增长，超过了分析师的预期。【原文：Uniqlo owner Fast Retailing Co. forecast stronger profit and sales for the fiscal year ending August 2026, surpassing analyst expectations.】

item.title: 经济面临风险，菲律宾意外下调关键利率
item.description: 菲律宾中央银行周四将基准利率下调了四分之一个百分点，此举出人意料地延长了一年多前开始的刺激经济活动的宽松周期。【原文：The Philippine central bank reduced the benchmark interest rate by a quarter point on Thursday, in a surprise move extending an easing cycle that began over a year ago to stimulate economic activity.】

item.title: 英格兰家庭的水费可能会再次上涨
item.description: 英格兰家庭的水费可能会再次上调，不过上调幅度比之前预计的要小。【原文：Households in England may get slapped with another hike in water bills, though a smaller increase than previously expected.】

item.title: 德国出口意外下降，对美出口减少
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统发起的关税运动中，德国对美国的出口额骤降至近四年来的最低水平，德国出口意外地连续第二个月下降。【原文：German exports unexpectedly fell for a second month as the value of shipments to the US plunged to their lowest level in almost four years amid President Donald Trump’s tariff campaign.】

item.title: LG 印度公司 13 亿美元首次公开募股认购翻了五番，出价强劲
item.description: 在机构投资者和富裕投资者强劲需求的推动下，LG 电子公司印度分公司首次公开发行的 13 亿美元股票获得了五倍的认购，预订过程还剩下几个小时。【原文：LG Electronics Inc.’s $1.3 billion initial public offering of its Indian unit was five times subscribed with hours still left in the bookbuilding process, driven by strong demand from institutional and wealthy investors.】

item.title: ASML 任命 Marco Pieters 为首席技术官
item.description: ASML Holding NV 任命 Marco Pieters 为这家芯片设备公司的执行副总裁兼首席技术官，向首席执行官 Christophe Fouquet 汇报工作。【原文：ASML Holding NV named Marco Pieters as executive vice president and chief technology officer of the chip-equipment company reporting to Chief Executive Officer Christophe Fouquet.】

item.title: 人工智能代理初创公司 N8n 获英伟达 25 亿美元估值支持
item.description: N8n 是一家帮助企业部署人工智能代理的德国初创公司，该公司已融资 1.8 亿美元，以在包括 OpenAI 在内的拥挤市场中竞争。【原文：N8n, a German startup that helps businesses deploy artificial intelligence agents, has raised $180 million to compete in a crowded market that includes OpenAI.】

item.title: 加密货币帮助特朗普当选。现在它正在向英国的法拉奇示好
item.description: 7 月下旬，来自全球最大的几家数字资产公司的高管齐聚伦敦金融城，聆听英国右翼改革党政策负责人齐亚-尤素福（Zia Yusuf）阐述他对加密货币在英国金融业中的作用的愿景。【原文：In late July, senior executives from some of the world’s largest digital-asset companies gathered in the City of London to hear Zia Yusuf, head of policy at the right-wing Reform UK party, lay out his vision for crypto’s role in Britain’s financial industry.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚在虾辐射恐慌后拒绝废金属
item.description: 在一个工业基地和运往美国的虾中发现放射性污染后，印度尼西亚已停止进口废金属，因为当地的金属加工商也受到了影响。【原文：Indonesia has halted imports of scrap metal after tracing radioactive contamination found at an industrial site and in shrimp shipments to the US to local metal processors.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将下跌，英镑保持稳定
台积电公布因人工智能需求持续增长而销售额超预期
item.description: 随着美国大型科技公司继续在人工智能领域下数十亿美元的赌注，台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司公布其第三季度销售额增长了 30%。【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. reported a 30% increase in its third-quarter sales as major US tech companies continued to make multibillion-dollar bets on AI.】

item.title: 斯塔默与莫迪在孟买会晤，深化贸易和商业关系
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）和英国总理基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）周四在孟买开始了双边会谈，英国领导人正在推动迅速实施两国今年早些时候签署的自由贸易协定。【原文：Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi and his British counterpart Keir Starmer began their bilateral meeting in Mumbai on Thursday, as the UK leader pushes for swift implementation of the free trade agreement the two nations signed earlier this year.】

item.title: 赞比亚创纪录的铜矿产量遇上红火的市场
item.description: 赞比亚今年的铜产量有望创下历史新高，从而在铜价飙升和需求增长的背景下，巩固其作为全球主要供应国的地位。【原文：Zambia is poised for record copper production this year, bolstering its standing as a key global supplier just as prices surge and demand is set to grow.】

item.title: 阿布扎比 ADQ 即将获得 40 亿美元贷款，将与大中华区银行合作
item.description: 阿布扎比主权财富基金 ADQ 即将获得一笔 40 亿美元的银团贷款，主要来自大中华区的贷款机构，这是中东地区利用亚洲银行流动性的最新一笔交易。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s sovereign wealth fund ADQ is close to securing a $4 billion syndicated loan, primarily from lenders based in Greater China, in the latest Middle East deal tapping Asian bank liquidity.】

item.title: 埃及要求液化天然气供应商推迟发货至年底
item.description: 由于需求低于预期，埃及要求其液化天然气供应商推迟原定于今年剩余时间的运输。【原文：Egypt is asking its liquefied natural gas suppliers to delay shipments scheduled for the rest of the year on weaker-than-expected demand.】

item.title: 新西兰和澳大利亚主权债券拍卖火爆
item.description: 在新西兰和澳大利亚的债务拍卖吸引了强劲的需求之后，这两个国家的主权债券延续了涨势。【原文：New Zealand and Australian sovereign bonds extended a rally after debt auctions in the two nations drew robust demand.】

item.title: 这不是选民想要的资产繁荣
item.description:
连接点显示出对通胀上升的悲观情绪日益加深。【原文：

Connecting the dots shows deepening pessimism about higher inflation.

】

item.title: 人工智能热潮如何影响一座荷兰小城
item.description:
ASML希望在埃因霍温新建一座巨型工厂，但该项目首先需要克服一些基本障碍。【原文：

ASML wants to build a giant new facility in Eindhoven, but the project first needs to overcome some basic hurdles. 

】

item.title: Eunice 将利用规划中的埃及-希腊输电线路生产绿色氢气
item.description: 希腊尤尼斯能源集团（Eunice Energy Group）表示，该公司正计划利用从埃及进口的可再生能源生产绿色氢气。【原文：Greece’s Eunice Energy Group said it’s planning to use renewable power imported from Egypt to produce green hydrogen.】

item.title: 美国批准英伟达在阿联酋的部分销售，迈出特朗普人工智能外交的一步
item.description: 美国已批准向阿拉伯联合酋长国出口价值数十亿美元的英伟达公司芯片，这是实施一项有争议的交易的第一步，该交易可能成为美国人工智能国策的蓝图。【原文：The US has approved several billion dollars worth of Nvidia Corp. chip exports to the United Arab Emirates, an initial step in implementing a controversial deal that could serve as a blueprint for American AI statecraft.】
